#1c
We are looking for an experienced 1C programmer at Unical!

Main requirements for a 1C programmer:

Knowledge of the 1C platform and configuration.
Experience with 1C software at least 1 year
Experience in accounting automation and programming based on standard and non-standard 1C configurations.
Experience in integrating 1C software with external programs.
Experience in drafting technical specifications and user instructions.
Experience in testing a 1C program and describing its errors.
Skills in research, analysis and description of business processes.
Knowledge of the basics of accounting and management accounting is also desirable.

Availability of 1C Certificate is welcome

We offer:
- Stable salary;
- Employment in accordance with the Labor Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan;
- Opportunity for professional growth and career development.
- Salary: determined based on the results of the interview (from 5 mln)

Contact @unical_hr

#AWS
We are looking for

2-3 AWS Consultants (f/m/d) - 100% remote project - February 2024


Tasks:
- Consulting and support AWS services
- Willingness to be part of on-call team and take on-call-duties for 24/7 (from time to time)

Skills:
- Project Knowhow - ITIL Proces Icident and problem management
- Support and Strong AWS project experience
- Longterm experience with AWS ECS, Lambda, Cloudwatch, RDS PostgtesSQL, EC2
- Experience with CDK and API Gateway
- Knowledge in one of the following skills: nodeJS, TS, Java/Kotlin would be a plus
- Knowledg of Talend cloud skills for ETL, Identification of Dataobjects, Assignment of Talend Jobs woud be a plus


Language: English
Start: February 2024
Duration: 6 Months + Option
Utilization: 5 days/week
Location: remote
Salary: up to $2000

Send resumes to: @itdevaustria

#cpp
Join AMC Bridge as a C++ Software Engineer in Tashkent! 

Are you a skilled C++ Software Engineer with a passion for engineering software development? AMC Bridge offers the opportunity to grow and thrive while working on exciting, large-scale projects for leaders in the engineering industry. 

â€¢ Competitive Salary: $1200â€”$5000 based on interview results. 
â€¢ Experience Requirement: 3+ years of software development, ideally within CAD, PLM, or other engineering software domains. 

What Youâ€™ll Bring: 

- Strong C++ development skills with a focus on object-oriented programming (OOP). 
- Familiarity with core tools and libraries like STL, MFC, ATL, COM, and Win32API. 
- Experience in CAD or other engineering software is a plus. 
- Proven ability to independently solve problems and collaborate in a team environment. 

Why AMC Bridge? 

- We donâ€™t just hire for projectsâ€”we hire for long-term growth. The average tenure of our specialists is 4.7 years. 
- Collaborate with industry-leading companies on innovative and impactful projects. 
- Participate in a vibrant culture of knowledge sharing through internal meetups and seminars. 
- Enjoy paid vacation and extra days off after three years of service, along with regular salary and performance reviews. 
- Benefit from paid public holidays, sick leave, and a supportive work environment that values your contributions. 

Sounds interesting? Click the link to send your resume via website form  

For more information contact Abbos, Managing Director, AMC Bridge Uzbekistan.

#csharp
AMC Bridge is looking for CAD C# Desktop Software Development Engineer!
 
AMC Bridge is a global IT company and   resident of the IT Park in Tashkent. Since 1999, we have specialized in engineering software, developing cutting-edge solutions for the aerospace, engineering, robotics, architecture, and industrial construction industries.
 
As our team grows, we are looking for a CAD C# Desktop Software Development Engineer to join us! 
 
We are looking for: 
â€¢ Experience: 3+ years in software development, preferably with CAD, PLM, or other engineering applications. 
â€¢ Role: Develop plug-ins for CAD systems like InventorÂ®, RevitÂ®, and AutoCADÂ®, and fix bugs for a major cable producer contractor. 
 
Required Skills: 
-  Strong experience in C# and .NET. 
-  Practical experience with WPF or WinForms frameworks. 
-  Knowledge of design patterns and principles. 
-  Understanding of data structures and algorithms. 
-  Fundamentals of computational or discrete geometry, 3D graphics, or linear algebra. 
-  Strong experience in programming RevitÂ® CAD software. 
-  Familiarity with RhinoÂ®, SOLIDWORKSÂ®, Solid EdgeÂ®, BRL-CAD, and other CAD software with .NET SDK or API is a plus. 
-  Problem-solving skills. 
-  Intermediate or higher proficiency in English. 
 
Join our strong, united global team! For more information or to apply,   visit our website.

Salary: from $1200 and Negotiable

#datascientist
Data Scientist at Super Dispatch!

Location: Central Asia

About the Role:

- Responsible for building and evolving real-time marketplace pricing engines using machine learning and adapting to market changes. 
- Collaborate with stakeholders to enhance existing recommendation engines and develop a deep understanding of the auto transport industry to improve machine learning models and provide thought leadership to product and engineering teams. Additionally, seeking someone with strong technical skills to handle data unloading, processing, uploading, release management, and proficiency in DevOps tools.

Requirements:

- 3-4 years of experience
- Python & SQL
- ML Frameworks & cloud experience 
- Good English level

What We Offer:

- Generous salary package around $3-5,5k
- Unlimited vacation days 
- Gym membership 
- English language courses 
- Remote or office-based work options 
- Plus, many more perks!

Apply here : https://superdispatch.breezy.hr/p/fe7e427eefb9-data-scientist

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to take your career to the next level with Super Dispatch! Apply now!

text:
#devops
Senior DevOps Engineer 

Join AMC Bridge as a Senior DevOps Engineer in Tashkent! 

Join our team to design cloud solutions, automate infrastructure, and scale systems for millions! Work with the latest tech, streamline development, and enhance security. Collaborate with experts, grow professionally, and impact projects across industries. 

Competitive Salary: $1200â€”$5000 based on interview results.

Experience requirement: at least 5 years of experience in DevOps / SRE or a related field. 

Requirements: 
- Proven AWS experience. 
- Expertise with Docker, Kubernetes. 
- Strong skills in Terraform, CloudFormation. 
- Solid networking & security knowledge. 
- CI/CD pipelines & tools experience. 
- Programming in Python, Go, PowerShell. 
- Linux admin & troubleshooting expertise. 
- Problem-solver & independent worker. 

Why AMC Bridge? 
- We donâ€™t just hire for projectsâ€”we hire for long-term growth. The average tenure of our specialists is 4.7 years. 
- Grow with regular salary and performance reviews. 
- Collaborate with industry-leading companies on innovative and impactful projects. 
- Benefit from paid vacation, paid public holidays, sick leave, and a supportive work environment that values your contributions. 

Sounds interesting? Click the link to send your resume via website form  

For more information contact Abbos, Managing Director, AMC Bridge Uzbekistan.

#engineeringmanager #leadership
Senior Engineering Manager at Super Dispatch!

Location: Anywhere in the World 

About the Role:

- As the Senior Engineering Manager, you'll lead a dynamic team of 5-15 engineers and team leads, driving the growth of Super Dispatch's products. 
- Your role involves managing people, overseeing execution, and delivering business value. With your technical expertise and strong leadership, you'll shape the direction of the team and drive technical excellence.

Requirements:

- 4 years of team management experience (or equivalent)
- 5 years of strong technical background (in Python)
- Advanced English 

What We Offer:

- Generous salary package around $6-10k
- Unlimited vacation days 
- Gym membership 
- English language courses 
- Remote or office-based work options 
- Plus, many more perks!

Apply here : https://superdispatch.breezy.hr/p/caa83c351b7d-senior-engineering-manager

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to take your career to the next level with Super Dispatch! Apply now!

text:
#flutter 
Flutter Developer

Company: Quantum LLC  

About Us:
Quantum LLC is a growing IT company committed to delivering high-quality products and services. We are seeking a skilled Flutter Developer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the development of innovative mobile applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
- Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Required Skills:
- Proven commercial experience.
- Confident knowledge of Dart.
- Knowledge of modern architectural patterns in mobile development (Clean Architecture, BLoC, MVVM, MVP).
- Knowledge of Google services such as Firebase, Google Cloud, Maps, Firebase messaging, etc.
- Clean, tidy code following Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices.
- Experience with REST API (Dio).
- Code generation (freezed, json serialization).
- Analytics (Firebase, Yandex AppMetrica).
- Local push notifications.

We Offer:
- Competitive Salary: Up to $2000 per month.
- Comfortable Office: A modern and comfortable workspace.
- Career Growth: Clear paths for advancement and promotion.
- Working Hours: Monday to Friday, from 10:00 to 18:00.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume to Telegram address @QuantumLLC_hr with the subject line "Flutter Developer Application."

#frontend
Join ''OldCity'' as Middle Frontend Developer! 

Salary: from $700 and Negotiable 
Schedule: Full-Time
Location: Tashkent

Requirements:

* High proficiency in React.js 
* Familiarity with Graphql and asynchronous data loading.
* Knowledge of state management libraries (e.g., Redux,).
* Ability to write clean, reusable, and modular code.
* Proven experience in creating high-quality frontend solutions.
* JavaScript/TypeScript Proficiency: 1+ years of web development experience, with a strong focus on JavaScript and TypeScript.
* React Experience: 1+ years of demonstrated experience building React applications.
* Proven Portfolio: A portfolio of frontend projects on platforms like GitHub, showcasing your work on web apps or websites.
* Language Skills: Native Uzbek, English Proficiency Must. Russian optional.
* Coding Best Practices: Understanding of clean code, documentation, refactoring, and Git/version control.

Strong Pluses:
* Graphql, Apollo Client
* Node.js
* Full-Stack Development Workflow

Our Offer:
* Workspace in Tashkent
* Flexible 5/2 schedule

Don't Ask, Please!:
* Remote/Online Job
* Internship, right now! 
* Part-Time

Company: OldCity 

Apply Here: @Halal_Name_Abdulaziz

text:
#frontend #junior+
We currently need Frontend developers that have experience in VueJS/ReactJS. 

At Unical, we're passionate about harnessing the power of technology to transform industries, businesses, and lives. Established in 2021, our journey has been marked by innovation, a dedicated team of over 30 developers, and a commitment to delivering exemplary services. We've proudly served more than 200 clients, catapulted EdTech and FinTech startups to success, and have consistently been recognized for on-time service delivery and unwavering quality.


Brief information
- Creation of front-end for ERP, HRM, CRM etc.

Requirements
- Experience with VueJS/ReactJs at least 1 year

#frontend #senior
Senior Frontend Developer
Format: Remote
Employment: Full Time
Salary: $2,000 and $3,000
Company: Apollo

Apollo team is looking for an experienced Senior Frontend Developer for Full time position.


Responsibilities
â€¢ Develop user interface architecture using algorithms.
â€¢ Collaborate with designers and backend developers to translate requirements into specifications.
â€¢ Optimise the performance of the user interface 
â€¢Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
â€¢Work with the latest UI technologies, tools and best practices.
â€¢Debug and Resolve complex UI issues and bugs.


Requirements:
â€¢At least 2-3 years of professional experience with JavaScript.                                                                                                                                                
â€¢Demonstrate a solid understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and their interaction with frontend frameworks
â€¢Knowledge of Git (GitHub, Gitlab, RESTful API).
â€¢Understanding of UI/UX best practices.
â€¢Excellent problem solving and debugging skills.
â€¢Knowledge of algorithms is a must.
â€¢Warehouse management and complex data processing.
â€¢Communication skills and English language level B2+

We offer:
â€¢Unique projects and opportunities for professional growth.
â€¢Flexible schedule with the possibility to work remotely.
â€¢Competitive salary and bonuses on a project basis.


If you'd like to join our cool, young team and are ready to grow and develop, please complete the form on our website: https://apollos.studio/careers/senior-frontend-developer-4647

text:
#frontend #vue #nuxt
Job Title: Frontend Developer (Vue/Nuxt)
Company: Softonic Uzbekistan
Location: Tashkent
Experience Level: Mid-level (2+ years of commercial experience)
Salary: 1000$ +

---

Job Description:
Softonic Uzbekistan is looking for an experienced Frontend Developer with a strong foundation in Vue or Nuxt to join our growing team. You will be responsible for building high-quality, responsive interfaces and ensuring cross-browser compatibility across our projects. As part of our team, youâ€™ll work closely with backend developers and designers to deliver seamless, performant user experiences.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain front-end features using Vue.js, Vue Router, Vuex, Pinia, and Nuxt.
- Implement responsive, cross-browser compatible layouts using HTML, CSS, SASS, and Tailwind.
- Use flexbox and grid layout for effective page structure and alignment.
- Collaborate using Git for version control.
- Integrate TypeScript for type-safe and scalable code.
- Set up and manage build configurations using Vite and Webpack.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of commercial experience in Vue or Nuxt development.
- Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and responsive design.
- Strong knowledge of Vue.js and the latest Vue 3 features.
- Experience with Vue Router, Vuex, Pinia, and Nuxt.
- Confident in working with Git for collaborative projects.
- Skills in modern layout techniques, specifically flexbox and grid layout.
- Experience with Vite and Webpack for bundling and optimizing projects.
- Knowledge of CSS preprocessors like SASS and utility-first frameworks like Tailwind CSS.

Our Tech Stack:
- Frontend Frameworks: Vue.js / Vue 3, Nuxt.js / Nuxt 3
- Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript
- Styles: CSS, SASS, Tailwind

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- Collaborative, innovative work environment.

If youâ€™re passionate about frontend development and eager to contribute to exciting projects at Softonic Uzbekistan, apply by sending your resume and a cover letter to @softonic_uzbekistan.

text:
#fullstack
Riwaya is the worldâ€™s first online premium Islamic marketplace.  As a remote team, we are built for the Islamic and Ethical consumer and business in mind. Bringing together amazing faith inspired sellers and customers in one easy-to-navigate platform.

Job Descriptions
Work directly with the founder from the comfort of your home and be part of a global team to develop and iterate on Riwayaâ€™s latest version â€“ Riwaya 5.0. 
The role will include working on exciting features, where youâ€™re only limited by your curiosity. This is an excellent opportunity to see how to build a start-up from 0-1. Example of work may be: 
New API development
Better user onboarding
New features
Improve UX/UI
Payment flows
Vendor features
Implementation of generative AI

Role and Responsibilities 
Lead software development activities on the platform, bringing experience of best practice across coding, integration, testing, debugging, documentation and implementation 
Promote good design principles, such as code reuse, modularity, and extensibility
Report status and progress according to the project and company demands
Assist and lead on the creation of technical, estimation and development planning
Creating new plugins and augmenting functionality for existing ones.
Exploring and implementing solutions for SEO optmised processes across the site and advertising processes on our sites.
Adapting to the latest PHP versions.


Job Skills and Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
Experience in a software engineer role
Fluent in English (writing and speaking)
Experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Smarty, jQuery, PHP
Strong SQL and mySQL skills
Experience in both back end and front end execution
Good communication skills
Working hours overlap with GMT 
Self-learner and ability to execute tasks without any supervision.
Ability to maintain the highest level of professionalism at all times

Benefits
Salary
Upto $500 for junior
Upto $900 for mid 
Upto $1500 for senior 
Opportunity to fully own workstreams and manage co-workers
Equity compensation potential, based on performance
Contract Role 
100% Remote Role

Contact: people@riwaya.co.uk
Website: www.riwaya.co.uk
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/riwaya.co.uk

#fullstack 
Full-Stack Software Development Engineer

Join AMC Bridge as a Full-Stack Software Development Engineer!  
 
Are you an experienced professional with a background in service-based companies? Or perhaps you are eager to work on diverse projects in a dynamic environment? If so, we have the perfect role for you.  
 
Our team is seeking a Full-Stack Software Developer to engineer cutting-edge software solutions for high-impact industries such as aerospace, mechanical engineering, robotics, architecture, and industrial construction.  
 
We are looking for:  
A specialist with 3+ years of software development experience, preferably within CAD, PLM, or other engineering software applications.  
 
Required Skills:  
- Proven front-end experience with React.js or Angular.  
- Proven back-end experience with Node.js or C#.  
- Demonstrable knowledge of principles and design patterns.  
- Understanding of commonly used data structures and algorithms.  
- Ability to solve problems independently.  
- Intermediate or higher level of English proficiency.  
  
Our tasks and challenges are complex, and our global team is strong and united. We are excited to welcome a like-minded professional to the AMC Bridge team!  

Salary: $2000â€”5000 according to the results of an interview 
For more information or to apply, visit our website.

Contact information

#fullstack 
Fullstack Developer Wanted! 

We are Unical, Fintech company in search of a dynamic Fullstack Developer who's proficient in React, Vue and NodeJs and has experience with MongoDB.

Key Qualifications:
- Minimum of 2 years of professional development experience.
- Strong proficiency in React, Vue and Node.js.
- Solid understanding of MongoDb and experience in integrating it with Node applications.
- Hands-on experience deploying and managing applications in AWS.
- Expertise in state management with Redux.
- Comprehensive experience with Git and version control practices.
- Ability to handle end-to-end tasks, from the ideation phase to deployment.
- A proactive mindset and the ability to work in a fast-paced startup environment.

- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.

Middle $1000+

text:
#fullstack 
neoeco is the cutting-edge ESG Accounting Software provider based in London, United Kingdom. We are looking for a self-starter, product focused Senior Full Stack Engineer to directly work with our CTO and our founders to lead and grow our Product Engineering team.

Location: Remote (with the opportunity to relocate to London)
Salary: from $3000
Schedule: Monday-Friday, 9-5pm UK time or Tashkent time

Responsibilities:
- Actively participate in the development of our product
- Writing unit and e2e for robustness, edge cases, usability, reliability
- Conduct code reviews
- Contribute to documentation
- Participate in hiring

Requirements:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in software development
- Minimum 3 years of experience with React/Next.js, Node and Typescript
- Minimum 3 years of experience with SQL databases (Postgres) and ORMs (Prisma)
- Experience with integrating accounting and ERP softwares is a plus
- Experience with the rest of our tech stack is a plus

Our Tech Stack:
- React/Next.js, MUI, Node, Typescript, tRPC, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Nango (for integrations), AWS (ECS, Fargate, RDS, Cloudwatch), Terraform, Docker, GitHub, Jira

Our Offer:
- Salary from $3000
- Work from anywhere
- As an early member of the team, opportunities to level up to leadership positions
- Online courses
- Opportunity to relocate to London in the future

Apply here: https://neoeco.bamboohr.com/careers/30?source=aWQ9MjQ%3D

text:
#fullstack #dotnet #react 
Company: TRUSS (https://hiretruss.com/) 
Position: Senior Full Stack developer (.NET+React)
Salary range: up to 4000$
Location: Remote

The Company brings the latest in technology and automation to over 10,000 legal and accounting firms, empowering highly skilled professionals to refocus their expertise on what truly matters. The Company harnesses powerful and secure practice management, document automation, and payment processing to take firms, professionals, and their clients further.

WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON?
- As part of a cross-skilled team, you will:
- Write code every day.
- Provide technical and architectural leadership, and drive engineering quality across the full application stack for a growing development team.
- Propagate a professional culture of ownership, openness, and self-improvement within the team through development and mentoring of team members and the championing of best practices and standards.
- Collaborate with the Product Owner to own the entire development pipeline from inception to production.
- Interact with the rest of the business to gain deep understanding of our products, customers, and users.

WHAT SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
- C# and .NET Core (more backend, 80%)
- React (20%)
- REST APIs
- Entity Framework and Azure SQL
- Tools: Git, PowerShell, Jira, Confluence
- Experience with Legacy Code: Demonstrated ability to work with, understand, and maintain legacy codebases. The candidate should have experience in analyzing existing systems, refactoring old code, and ensuring compatibility with modern development practices and tools.
-Advanced English 

Important!
You will be working with a US team, so it is important to have overlap in timezones, at least from 9:00 till 14:00 CT. 
This position only for developers, who has more than 4+ years experience. 

To apply to this position please contact me via Telegram: @sbn_19 or e-mail: sabina@hiretruss.com

skills: AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, K8, Ansible, FreeSWITCH, Kamailio, RESTful, GraphQL, SQL, NoSQL, Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, Azure DevOps, ELK stack, Splunk
text:
#fullstack #senior 
We are looking for a senior full stack developer with experience in the VOIP field.
Here are the details of the required knowledge:
The following list gives a good idea of the tasks and responsibilities:

Infrastructure Management
- Cloud infrastructure setup and maintenance: Plan, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) to ensure scalability, reliability, and security.
- Use tools like Docker, K8, and Ansible to automate infrastructure provisioning and management.

VOIP Technology Management
- FreeSWITCH setup and maintenance: Install, configure, and maintain FreeSWITCH servers to ensure robust VOIP communication capabilities.
- Our SAAS application: Deploy and manage a GUI for FreeSWITCH, handling user management, call routing, and other PBX functionalities.
- Kamailio configuration: Set up and manage Kamailio for SIP signaling, load balancing, and security in VOIP systems.

Backend Development
- API development: Design and implement RESTful or GraphQL API interfaces to support frontend and external integrations.
- Microservices architecture: Develop and maintain microservices, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and efficient.
- Database management: Design and manage databases (SQL and NoSQL) including schema design, optimization, and query performance tuning.
- Server-side logic: Implement server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness to frontend requests.

Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)
- Pipeline development: Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, CircleCI, or Azure DevOps.
- Automation: Automate testing, integration, and deployment processes to streamline application updates and releases.

Monitoring and Logging
- Log management: Set up and manage log aggregation and analysis tools (e.g., ELK stack, Splunk) for troubleshooting and auditing purposes.

Security
- Security practices: Implement best security practices for cloud environments, including Identity and Access Management (IAM), encryption, and network security.
- VOIP security: Ensure secure configuration and operation of VOIP technologies, protecting against threats such as eavesdropping, toll fraud, and DDoS attacks.

Performance Optimization
- System performance tuning: Optimize the performance of applications and infrastructure to handle growing loads and maintain high availability.
- VOIP performance: Monitor and optimize VOIP call quality, latency, jitter, and packet loss to ensure high-quality communications.
- Cost management: Monitor and manage cloud costs, optimizing resource utilization to minimize expenses.

The ideal candidate should primarily be an experienced backend or full-stack developer with a background in developing VOIP solutions, similar to those mentioned earlier. While DevOps skills are also important, they are typically already present in senior developers.

*The client is from Israel and English is must have*

Salary starting from $2500

Send CVs to @orihero

skills: Golang, Kafka, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Docker, GitLab
text:
#golang
Golang Developers Wanted!

We're embarking on an exciting project to develop a new delivery app for Uzbekistan and Central Asia. We're seeking skilled developers who value teamwork, clear objectives, and room for personal growth.

If you're a talented professional who's tired of merely chasing paychecks and craves a chance to make a meaningful impact, consider joining us as a partner, not just an employee!

What We Offer:
- Competitive compensation ranging from $500 to $1200+ per month
- Dynamic and youthful team (aged 20-30)
- Cutting-edge technologies
- Strong leadership
- Exceptional product managers and UI/UX designers
- Opportunities for professional advancement and growth within the team

Tasks We'll Tackle Together:
- Designing microservice or monolithic architectures
- Integrating with external systems
- Refactoring and conducting code reviews
- Aligning requirements
- Cultivating a culture of test writing
- Documenting code and APIs

What We Expect from Strong Junior to Mid-Level Developers:
- 1-2 years of practical experience in industrial development
- Proficiency in Golang
- Familiarity with microservice architecture; experience with Kafka is advantageous
- Understanding of scalable system principles, common challenges, and solutions
- Strong grasp of data structures and architectural patterns
- Ability to break down and assess tasks
- Proficiency in Go's multithreading (goroutines, channels)
- Knowledge of database fundamentals including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis
- Experience with CI/CD, Docker, and GitLab
- Proficiency in Russian or English
- Comfortable working in a Linux environment

If you're intrigued, reach out to @kamilovv_b with your CV or LinkedIn profile. Let's build something remarkable together!

text:
#java 
Job Title: Java Developer
Company: Longhorn Logistics
Location: Tashkent
Job Type: Full-time
Experience Level: Mid to Senior Level (3+ years in Java development)
Salary: 1500$ +

---

Job Description:
Longhorn Logistics is seeking an experienced Java Developer with 3+ years of hands-on experience in Java development to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Core Java and Spring frameworks, along with expertise in working with databases and implementing design principles. You will play a key role in developing high-performance applications, ensuring code quality, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust and scalable solutions.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain backend systems using Core Java and Spring Boot.
- Utilize JPA and Hibernate ORM frameworks for effective database interactions.
- Apply SOLID and DRY principles to produce clean, maintainable code.
- Design and implement APIs, integrating seamlessly with front-end and third-party systems.
- Manage and optimize database interactions with SQL, PostgreSQL, and MariaDB.
- Use Spring Security and Spring Cloud to build secure and scalable applications.
- Work with JVM for optimal memory management and application performance.
- Collaborate with teams using Atlassian tools (Jira, Confluence) for project management.
- Utilize Docker for containerization and deployment.
- Implement messaging and data synchronization with RabbitMQ.

Requirements:
- 3+ years of professional experience in Java development.
- Proficient in Core Java: Deep understanding of OOP, JVM, Streams API, and Memory Management.
- Database Management: Strong command of SQL, particularly PostgreSQL and MariaDB.
- ORM Frameworks: Skilled in Hibernate and JPA.
- Design Patterns: Familiarity with Creational, Structural, and Behavioral design patterns.
- Design Principles: Knowledge of SOLID, ACID, KISS, and DRY principles.
- Spring Framework: Hands-on experience with Spring Core, Spring Boot, Spring Security, and Spring Cloud.
- RESTful API Integration: Experience integrating and building APIs.
- Nice-to-have Skills:
  - Knowledge of Spring WebFlux for asynchronous, non-blocking applications.
  - Experience with Docker and RabbitMQ.
  - Familiarity with Atlassian tools like Jira and Confluence for project tracking and collaboration.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
- Opportunity to work on challenging, high-impact projects.
- Professional growth opportunities with access to learning resources.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment.

If you are a skilled Java Developer with a passion for backend development and building scalable systems, we encourage you to apply. Please send your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience to @Murodjon_Muslimov.

#javascript
Apollo Development Studio is looking for a full-stack Senior JavaScript Engineer to lead a team of developers and participate in project estimation.

Salary $2,000 and $3,000 + bonuses

Requirements:

â€¢Deep understanding of Node.Js and JavaScript V8 Engine
â€¢Extensive experience with TypeScript
â€¢Knowledge of modern UI frameworks (Vue, React, Solid, Svelte)
â€¢Experience with Github, Github Actions, or other CI/CD tools
â€¢Ability to develop and maintain moderately complex backend applications
â€¢English language proficiency at B2+ level

Desirable:

â€¢Knowledge of React Native/Ionic platform
â€¢Experience with Docker, Nginx, Traefik
â€¢Strong experience with NuxtJs/VueJs
â€¢Knowledge of other languages such as Python, Go, Dart

Your responsibilities:

â€¢Create estimates
â€¢Communicate with the customer
â€¢Guide other team members
â€¢Participate in Frontend/Backend development
â€¢Participate in project development
â€¢Work on internal tools
â€¢Code reviewing
 
We offer:

â€¢Unique projects and opportunities for professional growth.
â€¢Flexible schedule with the possibility to work remotely.
â€¢Competitive salary and bonuses on a project basis.

If you'd like to join our cool, young team and are ready to grow and develop, please complete the form on our website. https://apollos.studio/careers/full-stack-senior-3647

#ml
SOFTONIC LLC is looking for Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Computer Vision and Edge AI) for US-based project

Role Overview:
The Senior Machine Learning Engineer will lead the development of computer vision algorithms and machine learning models for real-time event detection on edge devices. This role requires expertise in deep learning, computer vision, and optimization of models for deployment on Linux-based gateways with resource constraints.

Key Responsibilities:
Model Development: Design and implement machine learning models for features such as distracted driving detection, fatigue analysis, lane departure warning, and tailgating detection.
Computer Vision: Develop algorithms for image and video processing using data from cameras.
Edge AI Optimization: Optimize models for real-time inference on edge devices with limited computational resources.
Data Management: Collaborate on data collection strategies, including dataset preparation, annotation, and augmentation.
Testing and Validation: Conduct rigorous testing of models to ensure high accuracy and low latency in real-world conditions.
Collaboration: Work closely with the embedded systems engineer to integrate AI models with hardware components.
Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of model architectures, training processes, and deployment procedures.
Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior team members (if applicable).

Required Qualifications:
Experience: Minimum of 5 years of industry experience in developing machine learning models for computer vision applications.
Technical Skills:
Deep Learning Frameworks: Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, and OpenCV.
Programming Languages: Strong programming skills in Python and C++.
Edge AI Deployment: Experience with deploying models on edge devices using TensorFlow Lite, PyTorch Mobile, or similar.
Model Optimization: Knowledge of techniques like quantization, pruning, and knowledge distillation.
Hardware Acceleration: Familiarity with GPUs, NVIDIA Jetson platforms, Intel Movidius, or similar hardware accelerators.
Linux Systems: Proficient in developing and deploying applications on Linux OS.
Domain Knowledge:
Computer Vision: Expertise in CNNs, object detection, semantic segmentation, and video analytics.
Real-Time Processing: Experience with low-latency systems and performance optimization.
Soft Skills:
Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills to tackle complex technical challenges.
Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Team Collaboration: Ability to work effectively in a cross-functional team environment.

Additional Qualifications:
Industry Experience: Experience in the automotive, transportation, or safety systems industry is highly desirable.

Responsibilities Summary
Lead AI model development for computer vision tasks.
Optimize and deploy models on Linux-based gateways.
Collaborate with hardware and software teams for seamless integration.
Ensure compliance with data privacy and industry regulations.
Mentor and guide other team members as needed.

Team Collaboration
Interdisciplinary Work: Ability to work closely with software engineers, hardware engineers, and product managers.
Agile Methodologies: Experience with agile development processes and tools like Jira.
Version Control: Proficient in using Git for code collaboration.


Salary: from 20 mln to 35 mln UZS
Office location: near the Shakhristan metro station, Tashkent

Tel:  +998 (77) 706 00 77
TG: @softonic_uzbekistan

About the project:
Virtual Advantage, LLC develops software and service solutions to simplify investigation management for enterprise-level organizations.

Location: 100% remote job, but we are looking for a specialist in Uzbekistan or Georgia.

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with developers, designers, quality assurance specialists and the business team to ideate, develop, implement, and support new features and technical solutions using Scoutâ€™s full stack of programming tools.
- Assume full ownership of the assigned development tasks throughout the software development life cycle, from conception to deployment and maintenance.
- Write maintainable code, with accompanying tests and documentation, that will ensure smooth functioning of the application and databases.
- Test, troubleshoot, and debug software and the supporting application infrastructure, independently and in collaboration with the team to ensure uninterrupted, high-quality service to the clients.

- 4+ years of professional software development experience.
- Experience developing .NET applications (3-4 years).
- Experience with React (3-4 years).
- Experience with DevOps and deploying to cloud services (preferably in Azure).
- Fluent English.

skills: TypeScript, NestJs, SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Typeorm, ReactJs, REST
text:
#node #react
Mid-Level Node.js/React.js Developer

About Us:
Apps Do Wonders is a tech start-up focused on making productivity tools. Our top-ranked products, ChatGPT for Excel and ChatGPT for PowerPoint, are among the best Microsoft add-ins.

Job Description:
We're looking for a Mid-Level Node.js/React.js Developer to enhance our AI-powered Microsoft Excel add-in, ChatGPT for Excel.

Key Responsibilities:
Build applications with TypeScript, NestJs, SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL), and Typeorm.
Develop and maintain ReactJs components.
Collaborate to define, design, and release new features.
Review code to ensure high quality.
Create RESTful APIs.

Required Skills:
3+ years of experience with NestJs, ReactJs, and REST APIs.
Proficient in TypeScript and NestJs.
Strong experience with SQL databases and Typeorm.
Fluent in Russian (C1 level).
Self-motivated and interested in AI technologies.

What We Offer:
Salary: Starting at $2000 net and more depending on skills.
Innovative Environment: Work on cutting-edge AI applications.
Career Growth: Opportunities for learning and advancement.
Remote Work: Flexible working conditions.
Contact Us: @MKB_MokhiraKodirova

text:
#nodejs
Node.JS Developer (Middle/Senior)

Salary: from $1000 to 2500 
Schedule: Full-Time
Location: Tashkent

Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain all server-side components.
Ensure optimal performance of the central database and responsiveness to front-end requests.
Collaborate with front-end developers to seamlessly integrate elements.
Design back-end services for various business processes.
Create high-performance applications by writing testable, reusable, and efficient code.
Implement effective security protocols, data protection measures, and storage solutions.
Conduct diagnostic tests, rectify defects, and provide technical support.
Craft database schemas that align with and support business processes.

Requirements:
A minimum of 2 years of experience as a Node.js developer.
University degree in computer science, information science or a related field.
Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and relevant libraries and frameworks (NEST.JS, Express, Fastify).
Extensive experience with databases, including Postgres, Redis, and MongoDB.
At least 1 year of experience in unit and integration testing.
Familiarity with Docker, Git, GitHub, and CI/CD.
An understanding of front-end development.
Experience working in an Agile and Scrum environment.
Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills.
Successfully launched projects (at least 5)

We offer:
Official employment;
5/2 work schedule;
Comfort office in the city center 
Various incentive and bonus systems
Team building

How to apply:
If you would like to join our dynamic team, please send your resume and portfolio of projects to the contacts below:

Contacts:
+998944011800
@anysoftuz 
anysoftpro@gmail.com

text:
#nodejs 
Middle+/Senior Node.js Backend Developer
Company: Mohirdev
Format: On-site
Employment: Full-time
Salary: From 1500 USD per month, depending on the level of competence
Experience: 3+ years

Key Responsibilities
- Backend Development: Design, implement, and maintain backend services using Node.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB.
- Team Leadership: Lead a team of backend developers, providing technical guidance, mentoring, and fostering collaboration to ensure smooth project execution.
- API Development: Create and optimize RESTful APIs for seamless communication between the frontend and backend.
- Testing: Write comprehensive unit and integration tests to ensure individual components of backend services function as expected, and verify seamless interaction between different backend services and with external APIs.
- Cloud Integration: Utilize AWS services to build and deploy scalable solutions, ensuring high availability and reliability.
- Data Management: Implement efficient data storage and retrieval mechanisms, leveraging MongoDB and Redis.
- Message Queue Integration: Work with BullMQ for reliable message queuing and communication between microservices.
- Security: Implement and maintain robust security measures for data protection and system integrity.
- Collaboration: Collaborate with frontend developers, ensuring smooth integration between frontend and backend systems.
- Performance Optimization: Continuously optimize backend systems for speed, efficiency, and scalability.

Required Qualifications and skills
- Experience: 3+ years of hands-on experience in Node.js and backend development, with a proven track record of building scalable systems.
- Technical Skills: Advanced proficiency in Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, ExpressJS, MongoDB, AWS (ECS, EC2, S3), Cloudflare, Redis, BullMQ and other relevant technologies.
- Leadership Skills: Demonstrated ability to lead and mentor a team, ensuring effective collaboration and project delivery.
- Problem-Solving: Ability to tackle complex technical challenges and devise effective solutions.
- Code Quality: Maintain high standards of code quality, conduct thorough code reviews, and adhere to best practices.

Preferred skills
- Experience with serverless architecture and deployment.
- Knowledge of containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
- Familiarity with server-side rendering and optimizing applications for SEO.
- Exposure to CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.

Working conditions
- Career and personal growth opportunities.
- Access to modern hi-tech office facilities.
- Competitive salary reflecting your expertise.
- Integration into a large and cohesive team of qualified specialists.
- Opportunity to gain valuable experience in a dynamic development environment.

Telegram username to contact and send resume: @n_mansurov

text:
#nodejs #nestjs
Join ''Alisoft'' as a Middle Backend Developer!

Salary: from $1200 and Negotiable 
Schedule: Online
Location: Tashkent

Requirements:
* A minimum of 2 years of experience as a Node.js, Nest.js developer.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and relevant libraries and frameworks (NEST.JS, Express, Fastify).
* Extensive experience with databases, including Postgres, Redis, Websockets Socket I/O, MongoDB.
* At least 1 year of experience in unit and integration testing.
* Familiarity with Docker, Git, GitHub, and CI/CD.
* Experience working in an Agile and Scrum environment.
* Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills
* Experience with Graphql Microservice Architecture
* Language Skills: Native Uzbek, English Proficiency Must. Russian optional.

Strong Pluses:
* Graphql, Apollo Server
* Node.js, Nest.js Framework
* LeetCode is plus

Our Offer:
* Workspace in Tashkent
* Flexible 6/1 schedule

Don't Ask, Please!:
* Remote/Online Job
* Internship, right now! 
* Part-Time

Company: Alisoft 

Apply Here: @SMuhammadjon

text:
#php
Looking for a Middle + or Senior PHP developer

About Riwaya
Riwaya is the worldâ€™s first online premium Islamic marketplace. Based in the United Kingdom, we are built for the Islamic and Ethical consumer and business in mind. Bringing together amazing faith inspired sellers and customers in one easy-to-navigate platform.

Job Descriptions
Work directly with the founder from the comfort of your home and be part of a global team to develop and iterate on Riwayaâ€™s latest version â€“ Riwaya 5.0. 
The role will include working on exciting features, where youâ€™re only limited by your curiosity. This is an excellent opportunity to see how to build a start-up from 0-1. Example of work may be: 
New API development
Better user onboarding
New features
Improve UX/UI
Payment flows
Vendor features
Role and Responsibilities 
Lead software development activities on the platform, bringing experience of best practice across coding, integration, testing, debugging, documentation and implementation 
Promote good design principles, such as code reuse, modularity, and extensibility
Report status and progress according to the project and company demands
Assist and lead on the creation of technical, estimation and development planning
Creating new plugins and augmenting functionality for existing ones.
Exploring and implementing solutions for SEO optmised processes across the site and advertising processes on our sites.
Adapting to the latest PHP versions.
Job Skills and Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
5+ years experience in a software engineer role
Fluent in English (writing and speaking)
Experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Smarty, jQuery, PHP
Strong SQL and mySQL skills
Experience in cs-cart BIG PLUS
Experience in both back end and front end execution
Good communication skills
Working hours overlap with GMT 
Self-learner and ability to execute tasks without any supervision.
Ability to maintain the highest level of professionalism at all times

Benefits
Salary dependence on experience and performance in the application process 
Opportunity to fully own work streams and manage co-workers
Equity compensation potential, based on performance
Contract Role 
100% Remote Role
Salary up to $1250 depending on experience

Contact: people@riwaya.co.uk
Website: www.riwaya.co.uk
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/riwaya.co.uk

#php
PHP Dasturchisi

Englify MChJ kompaniyasi hozirda tajribali (Middle/Senior) darajadagi  PHP dasturchilarni qidirmoqda.
Jamoamiz kichik, lekin kuchli dasturchilardan iborat va hozirda yana ham kengayish arafasida

- REST API va Microservice loyihalarini ishlab chiqish
- CRM, LMS va boshqa tizimlar bilan integratsiya
- Joriy loyihalarimiz uchun texnik yordam ko'rsatish

Sizdan qanday ko'nikmalar kerak:

- PHP  Yii2, Nginx, MySQL va PostgreSQL 3+ yil
- RESTFUL API tamoyillari bilan kamida 2+ yil tajriba 
- Git va Linux bilan ishlash tajribasi

Bizdan sizga beriladigan sharoitlar:

- Katta ambitsiyali loyihalarda ishtirok etish
- 5/2 jadval bo'yicha ish
- Doimiy o'sib boruvchi ish haqi
- Moslashuvchan ish jadvali

#pm
Exciting Remote Job Opportunity! 

Are you a seasoned IT Project Manager looking for your next challenge? Look no further! Apps Do Wonders is extending a golden opportunity for individuals ready to spearhead the creation of groundbreaking extensions for Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, all powered by artificial intelligence (OpenAI, ChatGPT). And the cherry on top? A handsome salary of $1500 net awaits!
What Will You Be Doing?
As a pivotal member of our team, you'll be engaged in a variety of tasks across project management, customer support, product development, and marketing:

Project Management
 â€¢ Lead project planning, execution, and delivery with a keen eye for detail and efficiency.
 â€¢ Coordinate cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure project success.
 â€¢ Monitor project progress, identify risks, and implement effective mitigation strategies.
 â€¢ Utilize your expertise to streamline processes and optimize project outcomes.
Customer Support
 â€¢ Promptly respond to customer emails, ensuring satisfaction and problem resolution.
 â€¢ Assist users in troubleshooting issues and guide them through product adoption.
 â€¢ Craft engaging training videos and helpful articles to enhance user experience.

Product Development
 â€¢ Collaborate in refining product requirements, ensuring they align with customer needs.
 â€¢ Contribute to product testing and releases to maintain top-notch quality.
 â€¢ Utilize tools like Grafana and Google Analytics for product usage analysis and dashboards.
 â€¢ Engage in insightful research and data gathering to drive product innovation.
Marketing
 â€¢ Maintain the website, ensuring it remains current and appealing to visitors.
 â€¢ Produce compelling articles and blog content to drive engagement and brand visibility.
What Skills and Experience Are We Seeking?
 â€¢ Minimum of 3 years of experience in IT project management, demonstrating a track record of successful project delivery.
 â€¢ Solid proficiency in Excel, Grafana, and Google Analytics.
 â€¢ Strong command of English (Upper-Intermediate level or higher) for seamless communication with clients.
 â€¢ Proficiency in Russian is a must as our team operates in Russian.
 â€¢ Familiarity with SaaS products to hit the ground running in our dynamic environment.


Join us at Apps Do Wonders, where innovation knows no bounds, and your talents are celebrated! If you're ready to embark on an exhilarating journey in tech, send in your application today!  Send your CV: @MKB_MokhiraKodirova

#pm
Job Opportunity: Mid-Level Project Manager (Agile/Scrum)

We're a dynamic and fast-growing IT company based in Urgench, Uzbekistan, looking for a talented and experienced Project Manager (PM) to work on local projects! We specialize in providing cutting-edge solutions to our clients, and we need someone who can keep up with our pace, deliver high-quality results, and ensure smooth communication between our team and our clients. This is a fully remote position, so you can work from anywhere!

Responsibilities:
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring timely delivery and meeting deadlines
- Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective and efficient project delivery
- Use Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum, to manage and deliver projects successfully
- Clearly communicate project status, risks, and changes to stakeholders and team members
- Prepare and deliver regular project reports and presentations
- Identify and implement process improvements to enhance project efficiency and quality
- Take part in pre-sales processes, including making project estimations and contributing to proposals

Required Skills & Experience:
- At least 2 years of experience as a Project Manager, preferably in an IT environment
- Strong understanding and experience with Agile methodologies, particularly Scrum
- Proven track record of successfully managing and delivering projects on time and within budget
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Experience with project management tools like Jira, Trello, or Asana is a plus
- PMP or Scrum Master certification is a plus

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive monthly salary per project from $500
- Performance-based bonuses and KPIs
- Flexible working hours
- Fully remote position

How to Apply: If you're a skilled and motivated Project Manager who meets the above requirements, we'd love to hear from you! Please send your CV to @nlg_company

Note:
- This is a contract-based position, so you can work on multiple projects at once.
- We are open to candidates who are currently employed full-time and seeking additional projects on the side.
- This is a fully remote position, so you can work from anywhere in the world!
- Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to join our team and make a difference in the IT industry! Apply now!

Join ''OldCity'' as Middle Project Manager!

Salary: from $700 and Negotiable 
Schedule: Full-Time

Must-Haves:
* Experience as an IT Project Manager at least 1 year
* Experience with project management tools like Jira, Trello, or Asana is a plus
* Knowledge of project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, Kanban)
* Ability to work with large amounts of information and quickly immerse yourself in a new functional environment
* Analytical thinking, ability to identify and solve problems, as well as make decisions in difficult situations
* Ability to plan your working time and set priorities in multitasking mode
* Initiative, independence
* Activity, desire to develop
* Language Skills: Native Uzbek, English Proficiency Must. Russian optional.

Responsibilities of the Project Manager:
* development of project documentation, technical specifications, technical working project
* description of information flows
* setting Goals, Timeline
* developing a user manual
* description of data structures

Our Offer:
* Workspace in Tashkent
* Flexible 5/2 schedule

Don't Ask, Please!:
* Remote/Online Job
* Internship 
* Part-Time

Company: OldCity

text:
#pm
Project Manager - Unitlab AI  

Location: Tashkent, Near Oybek metro station
Job Type: On-site, Full-time
Company: Unitlab AI

About Us:
Unitlab AI is revolutionizing data labeling, helping AI/ML teams scale projects 15x faster and cut costs by 5x. Our platform accelerates AI development with efficient, scalable solutions worldwide. We seek a dedicated Project Manager to streamline execution and drive outstanding results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Project Planning: Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and deliverables in collaboration with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with product        goals.
- Resource Management: Allocate resources efficiently to ensure all projects are staffed appropriately and deadlines are met.

Qualifications:
- Experience: 2-5 yearss in implementing and managing IT projects (software development).
- Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills for interaction with clients and team members.
- Language Proficiency: Fluent in Uzbek and English, both spoken and written (including documentation and emails).
- Tool Proficiency: Proficiency in project management tools like Jira, Notion, Asana, Trello, or similar. Familiarity with collaboration tools like Slack and  Google Meet
- Team Leadership: Ability to form, decompose, and accept tasks from developers.

What We Offer:
Team Environment: Work with an experienced and friendly team.
Location: Office located in the city center of Tashkent.
Projects: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI projects and contribute to shaping the future of AI automation.
Salary: 800$

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to telegram_account .

Join Unitlab AI in Tashkent and contribute to exciting projects with global impact. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Tel:  +998 (99) 911 65 26
TG: @Shohruh_Karimqulov

#pm
Project Manager for IT Projects

Company: SOFTONIC LLC
Location: Tashkent
Job Type: Full-time

Salary: 10,000,000 to 20,000,000 UZS per month (commensurate with skills and experience)

About Us:
SOFTONIC LLC is a leading IT company based in Tashkent, specializing in software development projects for international clients, particularly in the USA. We pride ourselves on our experienced and friendly team, and we're looking for a skilled Project Manager to join us in delivering high-quality IT solutions.

Responsibilities:
Project Management: Coordinate and manage IT projects to ensure timely delivery and quality.
Methodologies: Utilize Agile and Prototyping models effectively.
Business Processes: Study and analyze business processes, including relevant US legislation.
Optimization: Develop proposals to optimize business processes.
Model Development: Create as-is and to-be models.
Diagram Preparation: Prepare BPMN and UML diagrams to represent business processes and system designs.
Documentation: Develop roadmaps, technical specifications, and other technical documents.
Testing: Conduct UX/UI and API tests when necessary.
Client Relations: Negotiate with customers, form, and classify requirements.
Team Coordination: Decompose tasks for developers and accept completed tasks.
Technical Understanding: Understand REST APIs and data structures.
Tool Usage: Work proficiently with Jira for project management.

Qualifications:
Experience: Minimum of 3 years in implementing and managing IT projects (software development).
Methodological Knowledge: Proficient in Agile methodologies and Prototyping models.
Analytical Skills: Strong analytical mindset with the ability to generate ideas for system functionality design.
Diagramming Skills: Experience in preparing BPMN and UML diagrams.
Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills for interaction with clients and team members.
Language Proficiency: Fluent in Uzbek and English, both spoken and written (including documentation and emails).
Technical Skills: Understanding of REST APIs, data structures, and experience in testing REST APIs.
Tool Proficiency: Experience working with Jira.
Team Leadership: Ability to form, decompose, and accept tasks from developers.

What We Offer:
Team Environment: Work with an experienced and friendly team.
Location: Office located in the city center of Tashkent.
Projects: Engage in interesting international projects.
Bonuses: Performance-based bonuses upon successful project completion.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to telegram_account .

Join SOFTONIC LLC in Tashkent and contribute to exciting projects with global impact. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Tel:  +998 (77) 706 00 77
TG: @Murodjon_Muslimov

#pm 
IT Project Manager (e-commerce)

Job description
At Githubit, we have one common goal â€“ to make millions of users of mobile and web applications able to book their dream holidays with ease!

Help us achieve our ambitious goals by joining our team as IT Project Manager.

What you will do

Cooperate daily with a dedicated IT team (Developers, Testers, UX Designers, DevOps)
Create a long-term vision for the product
Contact the clients and defining their needs
Conduct and moderate meetings (daily, planning, retro)
Assure high team performance and morale

You are the ideal candidate if you have
1+ years of experience as Project Manager 
Experience in working with business customers
Experience in working with e-commerce
Ability to effectively combine client and team needs
English min. B2/C1
We value communication skills and the ability to motivate teams

Application

Have you found an interesting job offer at Githubit? Send us your CV, and we will contact selected candidates.
Contact: @githubit

Marketing

Company: Lincoln Labs ( https://www.lincolnlabs.co/)
Position: Python developer 
Salary range: up to 1500$
Location: Remote

Civille CMS is a platform that aims to provide law firms and attorneys with an efficient system for managing, distributing and sharing leads that do not fit their practice, as well as allowing us to effortlessly manage websites and automate client-related communications regarding the digital marketing services we provide. The purpose of the project is to create a new lead  submission/management/distribution system that will improve efficiency and lead quality for our clients. Once the main project is complete, we will have more stuff to build, it will be a full-time job with lots of fun stuff to work on for YEARS!

Responsibilities:
- Develop new functionality for the lead management system, including integration with third party APIs and contributing to data storage and processing solutions.
- Set up the email & sms notification system (through 3rd party API service)
- Contribute to Agile Scrum ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups and retrospectives.
- After go-live: Provide project support by making minor changes requested by clients, fixing defects, and troubleshooting errors found in logs. As new products are developed, build new administration tools within the CMS.

What skills and experience we are looking for:
- 3+ years of experience as a Python developer.
- Proficiency in working with FastAPI.
- Strong knowledge of Relational and NoSQL databases.
- Experience with AWS.
- Understanding of RESTful architecture and API design principles.
- Familiarity with design patterns, specifically SOLID principles.
- Ability to work in an Agile Scrum environment and collaborate effectively with team members.

The successful candidate will play a key role in the development and implementation of a dashboard that allows customers to efficiently manage, distribute, and share leads, thereby maximizing their resources and improving their lead management process.

Important!
- Fluent Russian and English is essential;
- The working hours are from 12:00 till 21:00 Tashkent time
-This position only for developers, who has more than 2+ years experience. 

To apply to this position please contact me via Telegram: @sbn_19 or e-mail: sabina@hiretruss.com

text:
#python #backend
Join our team as a Fullstack Python Developer (Python/Django)


Are you a talented backend developer looking for an exciting new opportunity? We are currently hiring for a Fullstack Python Developer (Python/Django) position at MahsulotCom

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain high-quality web applications in Python using Django as well as HTML/CSS
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
- Ensure code quality, maintainability and scalability of backend systems.
- Conduct thorough testing, debugging and optimization of applications.
- Keep up with the latest industry trends and best practices.

Requirements:
- High level of proficiency in Python with Django.
- Solid understanding of backend development concepts and best practices.
- Experience with database systems (e.g. MySQL, PostgreSQL) and ORM frameworks.
- Good knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript
- Vuejs,Â  Vuex, Vue router will be plus
- Familiarity with RESTful API design and integration.
- Knowledge of version control systems (e.g. Git, GitHub).
- Ability to write clean, efficient and maintainable code.
- Excellent problem solving and debugging skills.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills.
- Proven experience in creating high-quality backend solutions.

We offer:
- Competitive compensation package based on your experience and skills.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Collaborative and inclusive work environment that values â€‹â€‹innovation.
- Access to advanced tools and technologies to improve productivity.
- Competitive and timely wages, starting from 8,000,000 sum.

Contacts for applications:
Apply to @unical_hr with the title â€œ{Name} Fullstack Developerâ€ and become part of our creative and professional team!

skills: Jira, Charles, Proxyman, Postman, SQL, Grafana, Git, Qase, Allure
text:
#qa
Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer

Company: Quantum LLC  

About Us:
Quantum LLC is a growing IT company committed to delivering high-quality products and services. We are seeking a skilled QA Engineer to ensure the quality and reliability of our software through comprehensive testing.

Responsibilities:
- Manual testing of mobile and web applications.
- Develop and maintain test documentation.
- Identify, document, and track defects.
- Conduct functional, integration, and regression testing.
- Communicate with development teams.
- Improve development and testing processes.

Required Skills:
- 1+ year of testing experience.
- Understanding of testing theory and software development.
- Client-server architecture knowledge.
- Experience with test documentation, mobile testing, Jira, Charles/Proxyman, Postman, and SQL.

Preferred Skills:
- Backend testing, logging systems (Grafana), mock services, Git/GitLab, test management systems (Qase, Allure).

We Offer:
- Competitive Salary: Up to $1000 per month.
- Comfortable Office: A modern and comfortable workspace.
- Career Growth: Clear paths for advancement and promotion.
- Working Hours: Monday to Friday, from 10:00 to 18:00.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume to Telegram address @QuantumLLC_hr with the subject line "QA Engineer Application"

text:
#reactnative #mobile
We are looking for React Native developer with at least 1 year experience!

What you'll do:

* Build the core of our cross-platform app: Turn design concepts into smooth, user-friendly interfaces using React Native.
* Collaborate to bring features to life: Work closely with our small, dynamic team to implement new functionality and solve exciting challenges.
* Own your work:  Iterate on features, debug code, and ensure our app always performs its best.

What we're looking for:

* Solid React Native foundation: At least 1 year of experience building and shipping React Native apps.
* Strong JavaScript/TypeScript chops: A deep understanding of these core web technologies. 
* State management savvy:  Comfortable with Redux or MobX.
* Eager to learn & contribute:  You're excited to wear multiple hats and have a real impact on our product.
* Experience with Figma!

What we offer:

* A seat at the table:  Help define our product's direction in a fast-paced startup.
* Flexible & supportive environment: We focus on results, not rigid hours.  
* Growth potential:  Develop your skills and advance your career alongside our company's growth.
* Competitive salary: $800 (negotiable based on experience)

Not a fit if:

* You require fully remote work or part-time.
* You don't have hands-on experience with  React Native.

Sounds like you?  Drop us your portfolio and resume at @abdu_james

text:
#remote #datascientist
Remote Data Scientist for IT BILIM. Company

Proposed salary starting from $3,500.

Job Description:

Design and Development: Lead the design and development of an AI portal that integrates with SharePoint, enabling querying and interaction with stored data using natural language processing.

Access Controls and Security: Implement and manage access controls and permission settings within the AI portal to ensure data security and compliance with internal policies.

Machine Learning Models: Develop and enhance machine learning models to improve the understanding and categorization of large datasets within corporate shares.

Collaboration: Work closely with IT and cybersecurity teams to ensure the AI portal adheres to all security protocols and data protection regulations.

Continuous Improvement: Continuously update and refine AI algorithms based on user feedback and evolving data management needs.

Documentation: Document all phases of the AI portal development process, ensuring scalability and maintenance of the system.

Project Management: Lead project planning, milestone setting, and timeline management, ensuring deliverables meet quality standards and project timelines.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

Bachelorâ€™s or Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field.
A minimum of 7 years of proven experience in AI development and familiarity with AI technologies and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Strong programming skills in Python, Java, or other relevant programming languages.
Experience with natural language processing and machine learning model development.
Knowledge of Microsoft SharePoint architecture and data management principles.
Excellent problem-solving abilities and strong analytical skills.
Ability to work independently and drive projects with minimal supervision.
Mandatory English language proficiency.
Work Environment:

This position is fully remote.

Telegram: @impudent_11

#sales
Sales Executive - Unitlab AI  

Location: Tashkent, Near Oybek metro station
Job Type: On-site, Full-time
Company: Unitlab AI

About Us:
Unitlab AI is revolutionizing data labeling, helping AI/ML teams scale projects 15x faster and cut costs by 5x. Our platform accelerates AI development with efficient, scalable solutions worldwide. We seek a dedicated Sales Executive to streamline execution and drive outstanding results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Lead Generation: Proactively identify, prospect, and engage with potential clients in the AI/ML space, including startups, tech companies, and enterprise AI teams. There is inbound traffic, but we are looking for someone to build out an outbound process.
- Product Demos: Present and demonstrate Unitlab AIâ€™s platform, showcasing how it can accelerate data labeling.
- Sales Targets: Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets, driving revenue growth for Unitlab AI.

Qualifications:
- Experience: 2-5 years of experience in B2B sales.
- Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to present technical concepts in a clear and compelling manner.
- Sales Skills: Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets in a B2B environment.
- Problem Solver: Ability to understand customer challenges and position solutions that meet their needs.

What We Offer:
Team Environment: Work with an experienced and friendly team.
Location: Office located in the city center of Tashkent.
Projects: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AI projects and contribute to shaping the future of AI automation.
Salary: $1000 + 20% commission per sale.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience to telegram_account .

Join Unitlab AI in Tashkent and contribute to exciting projects with global impact. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Tel:  +998 (99) 911 65 26
TG: @Shohruh_Karimqulov

text:
#senior #lead #engineer
Join NeoEco as a Senior/Lead Product Engineer!

Location: Uzbekistan, Remote

Embark on a transformative journey with us at NeoEco, a dynamic startup on a mission to revolutionize how businesses embrace sustainability. Weâ€™re looking for a product-minded leader who will not just develop software but will drive the vision and execution of our cutting-edge platform, making a substantial impact in the tech-sustainability sector.

What You'll Do:
- Lead the evolution of our sustainability platform, focusing on impactful product development beyond just coding.
- Partner with founders to mold our product strategy, ensuring it aligns with market needs and sustainability goals.
- Harness your expertise in Typescript, React.js, Prisma, Postgresql, AWS, and Terraform to build solutions that matter.

We Offer:
- A competitive salary starting at $3k+ per month, reflective of experience.
- An innovative, fast-paced environment that values quick thinking, bold risks, and a product-first approach.
- Exceptional opportunities for growth into senior leadership positions as NeoEco expands.

Looking For:
- 5+ years in software development with a significant focus on product-driven roles.
- Someone who embodies being a proactive communicator, honest, humble, and an excellent collaborator.

This is more than a software development role; itâ€™s a chance to be at the forefront of sustainable technology, shaping products that drive meaningful change. Ready to lead with a product mindset at NeoEco? Read the full job description and apply here

text:
#softwaredeveloper #linux #yocto
Embedded Linux software developer

About the company:

Austrian technology company, with more than 35 years of experience, that specializes on embedded systems for the building automations.

Job description: 

â€¢ Analysis, design and conceptualization of customized solutions
â€¢ Microcontroller, Linux and hardware development
â€¢ Documentation, testing and troubleshooting

Requirements:

â€¢ Fluency in English
â€¢ Knowledge of Yocto is a big advantage 
â€¢ Knowledge of data structure, algorithmic and methodic software development
â€¢ Microcontroller development with C and Assembler
â€¢ Experience with Linux, especially C/C++, Qt and Bash,
â€¢ Additional knowledge of tools like Git, Toolchains (incl. GCC, GDB) and general knowledge of circuit diagrams is a plus
â€¢ Minimum 1 year of real experience 

Further information:

â€¢ Job Location: Tashkent 
â€¢ Full-time: 38.5 h/5-day week 
â€¢ Salary: $1200 - 2000 (negotiable based on experience, working efficiency)
â€¢ Yearly performance bonus
â€¢ Possibility of on-sight trainings in European locations 
â€¢ Constant professional development and growth
â€¢ Flexible schedule

Please forward your resumes (in English) to @itdevaustria

#support 
Stylemix company is looking for Customer Support Specialists who are passionate about  delivering exceptional support experiences to join our support team.

Our ideal candidate for the Customer Support position has:
- Basic knowledge of WordPress
- Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS
- Excellent English writing and communication skills

Tasks:
- Monitor and reply to questions in our support platform
- Helping users troubleshoot the problems
- Identifying bugs in our plugins and themes and liaising with developers to get them fixed
- Providing high-level advice on setting up the themes and plugins

In return, we offer:
- 5/2, 8 hours work shift with 1 hour lunch break
- equipped workplace
- free breakfasts, lunches
- competitive salary from 3 000 000 to 10 000 000 UZS
- nice and friendly environment
- work with passionate and enthusiastic professionals
- fully packed game room

Contact person Elena
Telegram   @ElenaNurillaeva
Email           vacancy@stylemix.net

text:
#techsupport #windows #linux #cybersecurity
Kompaniya: Datagaze - kiberxavfsizlik yo'nalishida 5+ yil tajribaga ega bo'lgan milliy kompaniya.

Loyiha: Datagaze DLP - tashkilotlarning korporativ tarmog'idan konfidensial ma'lumotlarning sizib chiqishini oldini olish va xodimlar faoliyatini nazorat qilish tizimi.

Lavozim: Texnik ko'makchi.

Vakolat: Mijoz tashkilotlar bilan ishlash. Tashkilot xodimlarini Datagaze DLP tizimi bilan ishlashga o'rgatish. Loyiha doirasida kerakli dasturlarni o'rnatish, sozlash va diagnostika qilish. Mijozlardan kelayotgan texnik yo'nalishdagi murojaatlar bilan ishlash.

Talablar:
- Windows OS texnik muammolarini diagnoz qilish. Windows OS loglari, fayl strukturalari, tizimli sozlamalari va xavfsizlik sozlamalarini bilish talab etiladi. Active Directory Domain Controller va Group Policy Objectlar haqida bilish qo'shimcha ustunlik beradi.
- Linux OS terminalida erkin ishlash, Linux OS loglari, fayl strukturalari, tizimli sozlamalari va xavfsizlik sozlamalarini bilish talab etiladi.
- Tarmoq texnologiyalari haqida boshlang'ich bilimlarga ega bo'lish, Linux/Windows OS birida tarmoq sozlamalarini yaxshi bilish talab etiladi.
- Tarmoq va tizim administratorligi bo'yicha boshlang'ich bilimlar bo'lishi maqsadga muvofiq.

Bandlik: Ofisda, 6/1 rejimda to'liq ish kuni.

Til: O'zbek va rus tillarini bilish talab etiladi.

Tajriba: 1+ yil ish faoliyati talab etiladi.

Maosh: $500+.

Ish sharoiti: Unikal va qiziqarli loyiha, Toshkent markazida qulay va shinam ofis, o'z vaqtida maosh, yosh va do'stona jamoa, shaxsiy rivojlanish uchun imkoniyatlar va h.k.

Batafsil: Boshqa tafsilotlar yuzma-yuz suhbatda muhokama qilinadi.

Amaliyot: Diqqat! Hozirda talabalar va yangi o'rganuvchilar uchun amaliyot (stajirovka) yo'q.

CV ni qabul qilish: @datagaze_pm

#typescript
TypeScript Expert (In-House)

Starting from: 800 usd

Location:
Near Tashkent Subway Station (In-House Position)

About Us:
We are developing a product for e-commerce websites. Our team includes senior developers who will work alongside you. We offer official employment, a competitive salary, coffee, and snacks.

Requirements:
- Fluent in English and Russian
- Strong team player, proactive, and detail-oriented
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in real projects with TypeScript
- Experience with React and Node.js
- Must be willing to fully engage and immerse in the project
- This position is for advanced developers only

How to Apply:
Send your cover letter introducing yourself, your target salary, and your CV. Emails not meeting the requirements will be banned.

Join us and be a part of something exciting!

Email to: jobs@llamacommerce.io

#Ð¼Ð°Ñ€ÐºÐµÑ‚Ð¾Ð»Ð¾Ð³ 
We're Hiring: Digital Marketing Specialist!

About Us:
Apps Do Wonders is an innovative tech start-up, known for our cutting-edge applications enhancing productivity and efficiency. Our products, ChatGPT for Excel and ChatGPT for PowerPoint, are in the top 10 Microsoft add-ins on the marketplace.

What Will You Work On?
We are looking for an enthusiastic Marketing Manager to manage our marketing ventures, primarily focusing on:

Email Marketing:
- Execute email campaigns to inform customers about new updates.
- Oversee email automation, optimizing and improving campaigns.

Content Marketing:
- Implement SEO strategies to boost our websiteâ€™s visibility.
- Produce well-researched blog posts and â€˜How-toâ€™ articles.
- Develop and maintain landing pages and product pages.

Video Marketing:
- Create informative training videos.
- Produce short TikTok/Instagram videos to promote our products.

Social Media Management:
- Manage our social media profiles to engage with the audience and establish a strong online presence.

Skills and Experience:
- Proven experience in a marketing role with the responsibilities mentioned above.
- Knowledge of various marketing tools (e.g., Jasper.ai).
- Strong understanding of SEO, email marketing, and social media platforms.
- Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
- Proficient in content creation.
- Ability to work in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.
- Advanced level English proficiency.

Salary: $1000 net

Interested? Contact: @MKB_MokhiraKodirova

Flutter Developer

Revolution Global is hiring a Middle/Senior Flutter developer!

Salary Offered: $800 - $1600

About the Company:
Revolution Global has been active in the fintech and e-commerce sectors for several years, delivering numerous successful projects.

Requirements:
- At least 2 years of experience as a Flutter developer
- Strong knowledge of Dart, Firebase, and REST API
- Deep understanding of Rest / GraphQL / gRPC technologies
- Experience with architectural patterns (BLoC, Provider)
- Experience in publishing applications to App Store/Google Play

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with CI/CD and automated testing
- Cross-platform development experience
- Ability to develop web and desktop applications

Work Conditions:
- Official employment and competitive salary
- Work in a professional and dynamic team
- Comfortable and cozy office
- Work type: offline (in Samarkand) / remote is also considered
- Housing support (in Samarkand)
